tasks.task: Operator gets on the loader to check the fuel gauge
subtasks: Look down to read the fuel gauge

tasks.task: Driver reverses the loader to road
subtasks: Check rearview mirrors or turn head to observe surroundings
Slowly release the brakes and begin reversing

tasks.task: Operator waits for delivery of hay from the field
subtasks: Remain seated and monitor fuel gauge
Keep an eye on time until hay delivery

tasks.task: Drive the loader to the hay shed
subtasks: Navigate the loader onto the main road
Align the loader towards the hay shed entrance
Approach the hay shed slowly and park inside

tasks.task: Push the hay bales from the trailer into the hay shed
subtasks: Approach the trailer with the loader bucket
Lift the first bale onto the loader bucket
Position the bucket under the bale, engage the forks or scoop
Lift the bale onto the loader and secure it
Drive the loader towards the hay shed doors
Position the bale close to the doors
Discharge the bale into the hay shed
Repeat the process for each subsequent bale

tasks.task: Attach the trailer to the loader
subtasks: Approach the trailer with the loader
Position the loader near the trailer hitch
Secure the coupling pins or chains

tasks.task: Operator parks the loader on the main road by the field
subtasks: Open the cab doors and exit the loader

tasks.task: Check the fuel gauge
subtasks: Look down at the fuel indicator

tasks.task: Operator sends a text message to the farmer
subtasks: Open messaging app or拨打电话

tasks.task: Attach the trailer back onto the loader if necessary
subtasks: Reverse the process of attaching the trailer

tasks.task: Operator gets on the loader to check the fuel gauge
subtasks: Look down to read the fuel gauge

tasks.task: Driver reverses the loader to road
subtasks: Check rearview mirrors or turn head

tasks.task: Operator waits for hay delivery
subtasks: Remain seated and monitor fuel gauge

tasks.task: Drive loader to the hay shed
subtasks: Align towards the hay shed entrance

tasks.task: Push hay bales into the hay shed
subtasks: Lift and secure bale onto bucket

tasks.task: Attach trailer to loader
Operator parks the loader by the field
Check fuel gauge
Send text message to farmer
Reattach trailer if needed
